comments.body: Quote from: Catenaccio on November 24, 2024, 02:11:42 AMMichael Saylor wants MicroStrategy to have more green dots. Microstrategy needs more green dots, By this, Michael Saylor basically means that his company wants to buy more bitcoins. Because he made this same tweet twice on November 10th and November 17th, Michael Saylor bought Bitcoin a day after making these tweets. He last commented on Twitter on November 17 that his company needs more green dots, He then purchased BTC51,780 bitcoins.QuoteHe and his company will continue DCA Bitcoin, which is the end game in his investment insight.Yes, the company has started buying bitcoins in phases since 2020. From 2020 to date, MicroStrategy has purchased Bitcoin a total of 44 times now they have a total of BTC331,200 Bitcoins.
